title: Bleach
summary: Ichigo Kurosaki, a high school student with the ability to see spirits, becomes a Soul Reaper and battles evil spirits known as Hollows.

title: Fairy Tail
summary: Lucy Heartfilia teams up with Natsu Dragneel and other members of the Fairy Tail guild on magical adventures.

title: Jujutsu Kaisen
summary: A high school student swallows a cursed object and gains the ability to control its immense power, leading to battles against powerful curses.

title: Black Clover
summary: In a world of magic, Asta, a boy born without any magical power, strives to become the Wizard King.

title: Tokyo Revengers
summary: A young man gets a chance to travel back in time and save his former girlfriend by altering his life’s choices.

title: Blue Lock
summary: A soccer player joins a radical training program designed to produce the world’s most aggressive and ego-driven striker.

title: Dr. Stone
summary: In a world where humanity has been petrified for thousands of years, a genius scientist aims to rebuild civilization with science.

title: Fire Force
summary: In a world where people spontaneously combust into destructive entities, a special fire brigade fights to protect humanity.

title: The Seven Deadly Sins
summary: A princess seeks out a group of legendary knights, the Seven Deadly Sins, to save her kingdom from corruption.

title: Soul Eater
summary: Students at a school for weapon wielders and their human weapons battle evil to collect the souls of evil beings.
